member.name: T:Goedel.Mesh.MailProfilePrivate
member.summary: Describes a mail account configuration Private profile contains connection settings for the inbound and outbound mail server(s) and cryptographic private keys. Public profile may contain security policy information for the sender.

member.name: P:Goedel.Mesh.MailProfilePrivate.EmailAddress
member.summary: The RFC822 Email address. [e.g. "alice@example.com"]

member.name: P:Goedel.Mesh.MailProfilePrivate.ReplyToAddress
member.summary: The RFC822 Reply toEmail address. [e.g. "alice@example.com"] When set, allows a sender to tell the receiver that replies to this account should be directed to this address.

member.name: P:Goedel.Mesh.MailProfilePrivate.DisplayName
member.summary: The Display Name. [e.g. "Alice Example"]

member.name: P:Goedel.Mesh.MailProfilePrivate.AccountName
member.summary: The Account Name for display to the app user [e.g. "Work Account"]

member.name: P:Goedel.Mesh.MailProfilePrivate.Inbound
member.summary: The Inbound Mail Connection(s). This is typically IMAP4 or POP3 If multiple connections are specified, the order in the sequence indicates the preference order.

member.name: P:Goedel.Mesh.MailProfilePrivate.Outbound
member.summary: The Outbound Mail Connection(s). This is typically SMTP/SUBMIT If multiple connections are specified, the order in the sequence indicates the preference order.

member.name: P:Goedel.Mesh.MailProfilePrivate.Sign
member.summary: The public keypair(s) for signing and decrypting email. If multiple public keys are specified, the order indicates preference.

member.name: P:Goedel.Mesh.MailProfilePrivate.Encrypt
member.summary: The public keypairs for encrypting and decrypting email. If multiple public keys are specified, the order indicates preference.

member.name: T:Goedel.Mesh.PersonalProfile
member.summary: Describes the current applications and devices connected to a personal master profile.

The personal profile is divided into two parts, the Master Profile which should change rarely, if ever and the Current Profile which changes each time a device or application is added to or removed from the profile.
